SEARCH
Package fr.cs.group12.myFoodora.menu

Interface MenuFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteMenuFactory
public interface MenuFactory
This interface defines a factory for creating menu items in the MyFoodora system. It provides methods to create different types of menu items (starters, main dishes, and desserts).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MenuItem
    createDessert(String name, double price, boolean isVegetarian, boolean isGlutenFree)
    Creates a new dessert menu item with the specified details.
    MenuItem
    createMainDish(String name, double price, boolean isVegetarian, boolean isGlutenFree)
    Creates a new main dish menu item with the specified details.
    MenuItem
    createStarter(String name, double price, boolean isVegetarian, boolean isGlutenFree)
    Creates a new starter menu item with the specified details.

  • Method Details

    • createStarter

      MenuItem createStarter(String name, double price, boolean isVegetarian, boolean isGlutenFree)
      Creates a new starter menu item with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the starter.
      price - The price of the starter.
      isVegetarian - Indicates if the starter is vegetarian.
      isGlutenFree - Indicates if the starter is gluten-free.
      Returns:
      A new MenuItem object representing the starter.

    • createMainDish

      MenuItem createMainDish(String name, double price, boolean isVegetarian, boolean isGlutenFree)
      Creates a new main dish menu item with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the main dish.
      price - The price of the main dish.
      isVegetarian - Indicates if the main dish is vegetarian.
      isGlutenFree - Indicates if the main dish is gluten-free.
      Returns:
      A new MenuItem object representing the main dish.

    • createDessert

      MenuItem createDessert(String name, double price, boolean isVegetarian, boolean isGlutenFree)
      Creates a new dessert menu item with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the dessert.
      price - The price of the dessert.
      isVegetarian - Indicates if the dessert is vegetarian.
      isGlutenFree - Indicates if the dessert is gluten-free.
      Returns:
      A new MenuItem object representing the dessert.
